info.name: Bookings Service - Smart Meeting Room Dana Kossaybati Reem Hamdar
info.description:
Comprehensive testing collection for Smart Meeting Room Management System - Bookings Service

Author: Dana Kossaybati

This collection includes:

- All 9 booking endpoints
    
- Success cases for each operation
    
- Error cases (validation, authorization, conflicts, not found)
    
- Pre-request scripts for dynamic data
    
- Test assertions for response validation
    

Base URL: [http://localhost:8003](http://localhost:8003)  
Authentication: JWT Bearer Token (obtained from Users Service)

item.name: Setup - Get Authentication Token

request.description: Login to get JWT token for regular user testing
Login to get JWT token for admin testing

item.description: Setup requests to obtain authentication tokens for testing

item.name: 8. Get Booking History

request.description: Get complete audit trail for a booking
Non-existent booking - should return 404
Trying to view history of another user's booking (not admin/auditor) - should be forbidden

request.description: No authentication - should fail
